entities.name: Storm Deployment

effectors.name: restart
effectors.description: Restart the process/service represented by an entity

effectors.name: start

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: The location or locations to start in, as a string, a location object, a list of strings, or a list of location objects

effectors.description: Start the process/service represented by an entity

effectors.name: stop
effectors.description: Stop the process/service represented by an entity

sensors.name: service.isUp
sensors.description: Whether the service is active and availability (confirmed and monitored)

entities.description: A Storm cluster. Apache Storm is a distributed realtime computation system. Storm makes it easy to reliably process unbounded streams of data, doing for realtime processing what Hadoop did for batch processing
